review: I use it to watch Plex.  The UI is a bit inefficient and there aren't many options, but it works reasonably well.It also worked with Kodi but that was pretty ugly.  You have to install it from your computer and it's very technical.  Then, to actually access Kodi on this, you have to do about 10 clicks through weird menus.  It's not worth it for Kodi.  That's why we switched to Plex.
author: Jeremy

review: The fire stick is awesome! We cancelled our cable and switched to the Fire stick and haven't looked back! You really need a decent high speed Internet service to run this. We run it on 7 mbps and have a little issue while someone is gaming on the xbox. This has nothing to do with the fire stick tho. We love it!
